name: Home Defender (itch)
description:
A tiny tower-defense like game inspired by the flash game "Defend Your Castle". See how many days you can last against the unrelenting horde of enemies attacking your home. You have bombs, turrets and a mouse at your disposal!

Instructions:

Controls: You only need to use the mouse in this game. Pause screen is accessible through .

Items:

  • Bombs: Refills each level, maximum amount can be increased via upgrades. Destroys all enemies within radius.
  • Turrets: Damages enemies from afar but can be destroyed by enemy attacks

Enemies:

  • Slime: A fast but weak enemy making up most of the enemy forces. Can be killed easily by all means.
  • Witch: A strong ranged enemy who deal significant damage. Destroys turrets with ease.
  • Mushroom Dude: A strong tank that is immune to being drag and dropped. Deals massive damage but is weak to turrets and bombs.

---------------------------------------------

This is a tiny project for experimenting with Unity and a very rough prototype as a result it might not be particularly fun and especially not original by any means. A non-trivial amount of the assets are accredited to asset creators on itch.io who are kind enough to share their work.
